<script type="text/javascript">
function smarttag_onclick(region, title, level2) {
  var nameTag = '';
  var atiSmartTag = new ATInternet.Tracker.Tag({site: smarttag_domainID});
  nameTag = region;
  if( title != '' ) {
    nameTag = nameTag + "::" +title;
  }
      return atiSmartTag.click.send({name:nameTag, level2:level2, type:"action"});
  }
/* FOR GALLERY SLIDER */
function smarttag_vpv(region, title, level2, slideNo) {
  if( slideNo == null ){
    slideNo = "";
  }
  var atiSmartTag = new ATInternet.Tracker.Tag({site: smarttag_domainID});
  atiSmartTag.page.set({
    name: title,
    level2: _data.level2
  });
  atiSmartTag.page.set({
    chapter1: region
  });
  atiSmartTag.customVars.set({
    site: {
      1: region,
      2: _data.x2,
      3: 2,
      4: slideNo,
      5: _data.x5,
      6: _data.visitorcat,
      7: 2,
	  8: _data.lotameid,
	  9: _data.articleid,
     10: _data.articlecount,
     11: _data.printcat,
     12: _data.adblocker,
     13: _data.js,
     14: _data.pubdate
   }
  });
  if( region != '' && title != '' ) {
    atiSmartTag.dispatch();
  }
}

function smarttag_vpv_pagination(region, title, level2, pageNo) {
  if( pageNo == null ){
    pageNo = "";
  }
  var atiSmartTag = new ATInternet.Tracker.Tag({site: smarttag_domainID});
  atiSmartTag.page.set({
    name: title,
    level2: _data.level2
  });
  atiSmartTag.page.set({
    chapter1: region
  });
  atiSmartTag.customVars.set({
    site: {
      1: region,
      2: _data.x2,
      3: "",
      4: (pageNo)+1,
      5: _data.x5,
      6: _data.visitorcat,
      7: _data.x7,
	  8: _data.lotameid,
	  9: _data.articleid,
     10: _data.articlecount,
     11: _data.printcat,
     12: _data.adblocker,
     13: _data.js,
     14: _data.pubdate
   }
  });
  if( region != '' && title != '' ) {
    atiSmartTag.dispatch();
  }
}

</script>

  <div class="post-detail"><span class="name-sect"><a href="/zfinance/realtime" data-tid="20401">即时</a></span><a href="/realtime/singapore/story20170227-729800" data-path="node"><span class="post-title">本地股市周一跌0.27％</span></a><span class="datestamp">27/02/2017</span><div class="post-desc">海峡时报指数周一下挫0.27％或8.41点，闭市报3108.62点。全场成交量22亿5540万股，总额11亿5410万元，上升股214只，下跌股267只。</div></div></div>

function eraseCookie(name) {
	createCookie(name,"",-1);
}

function createCookie(name,value,days) {
	if (days) {
		var date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	}
	else var expires = "";
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}

function getCookie(c_name)
{
	var i,x,y,ARRcookies=document.cookie.split(";");
	for (i=0;i<ARRcookies.length;i++) {
		x=ARRcookies[i].substr(0,ARRcookies[i].indexOf("="));
		y=ARRcookies[i].substr(ARRcookies[i].indexOf("=")+1);
		x=x.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");
		if (x==c_name) {
			return unescape(y);
		}
	}
}
